english.segment1: Your love endures forever. reaches beyond the heavens. I will praise, I will praise
english.segment2: Your love is better than life. Your name alone satisfies. I will sing, I will sing
english.segment3: You are my God, You are my song. You are my love. I am found in You
english.segment4: Your holiness, Your majesty. Your presence fills my life. And the earth will shake. The skies light up. They join with us. Live to make Your praises glorious
english.segment5: No longer I who lives. Its Christ who lives in me. I am Yours, I am Yours
english.segment6: Im planted deep within You. My heart and soul will sing. Forever more, forever more
english.segment7: chorus: I want to taste of your mercy. I want to drink in your life. I want to rest in your fullness. I want to run in your light
english.segment8: Oh breathe in me. Oh breathe in me, Breath of Life
english.segment9: Touch me with your burning coal. Place it to my lips and let it blaze into my soul. Woe is me, for I am undone. My eyes have seen the majesty of the Holy One
english.segment10: I want to taste of your mercy. I want to drink in your life. I want to rest in your fullness. I want to run in your light
english.segment11: Oh breathe in me. Oh breathe in me, Breath of Life
